test_cases.title: POST /api/v1/tests - Valid Request with Expected Response
test_cases.description: Verify that a valid request with all necessary fields creates a new test case successfully.
steps: Send a POST request to /api/v1/tests with valid JSON containing all required fields.
Verify the returned JSON contains the correct test case details.
test_cases.expected_result: Response status code 201 Created, JSON containing the created test case details.
test_cases.preconditions: User must be authenticated with a valid token.

test_data.title: Test Case Title
test_data.expected_result: Expected result of the test case

test_cases.title: POST /api/v1/tests - Missing Fields in Request Body
test_cases.description: Verify that sending a request with missing fields returns a 400 Bad Request.
steps: Send a POST request to /api/v1/tests with a JSON request body missing one or more required fields.
Verify the response includes error message indicating missing fields.
test_cases.expected_result: Response status code 400 Bad Request, JSON with error message indicating missing fields.
test_cases.preconditions: User must be authenticated with a valid token.

test_cases.title: POST /api/v1/tests - Unauthorized Access
test_cases.description: Verify that unauthenticated users cannot create a new test case.
steps: Send a POST request to /api/v1/tests without a valid token.
Verify the response includes error message indicating unauthorized access.
test_cases.expected_result: Response status code 401 Unauthorized, JSON with error message indicating unauthorized access.

metadata.requirement:
API Endpoint: POST /api/v1/tests

Description:
Create a new test case. Requires authentication. Accepts test details in JSON format.

Generate API test cases including:
- Valid requests with expected responses
- Invalid requests (bad data, missing fields)
- Authentication/authorization scenarios
- Edge cases (empty data, large payloads)
